patthana21.22:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.22:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.22:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
